channel.title: PkScape F2P Source
channel.description:
Yeah, I worked on it for a bit. Decided I might do a different project. I chose this project since people said they wanted a pking server, so I decided to make a quick pking server. I'll probably work on a private project for a while and come out with something better. I could still host this, but I chose not to.
http://uppit.com/tfcvpit99fq5/PkScape.rar Includes: These PHP files were implemented into fluxbb forums.. so use those else you can convert them which takes 2 seconds. Online.php (Use as [img] on forums to display the online count). Wilderness cut etc etc. Kdr.php (Kills/Death Ratio) SQL dump Client Webclient Source All these features http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,516254.0.html
Fixed a few crashes, it's pretty stable now. Once I fixed all the crashes that happened while I ran it, it didn't at all again. EasyRsc pking is fixed Removed the GUI runs off CMD blah blah so on
It's F2P once again. That doesn't mean I removed every "P2P" Item or doesn't mean I removed P2P landscape, and so on. It just means there is no way to get Bloods, Dragon and such. So you have F2P gear. I don't care if you don't like the release, keep your comment to yourself.

item.title: PkScape F2P Source
item.dc:creator: @Tobbo88 Tobbo88
item.description:
@Tobbo88 wrote:

[quote=“The Djinn, post:7, topic:417073”][quote author=Tobbo88 link=topic=519010.msg4117706#msg4117706 date=1349258641]
Would this be a hard source to setup? im aware its old but i like it…

Never used sql before… thanks.

Edit:

Noone? i canot even offer to pay pfft.
[/quote]

It takes 2 seconds to setup. Use Xampp/Wampp/Mysql. Import the database or you can just disable them.[/quote]

After a while i got it workin but had to use a different client.

Would really be greatfull if anyone can help me work out how to get this webclient etc working. Dont know what you can offer on here but greatfullness? as your not aloud to pay

Read full topic

item.title: PkScape F2P Source
item.dc:creator: @The_Djinn The Djinn
item.description:
@The_Djinn wrote:

[quote=“Tobbo88, post:8, topic:417073”]what database do i import?

mind if i add u on msn?[/quote]

I don’t know, it should be in there. The sql file.

waj:

Why would anyone want to use a source Keith ‘made’?

“helped make”, but what’s the problem? It’s a release from a while back. It was made within like a day anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: PkScape F2P Source
item.dc:creator: @shawn4 shawn__
item.description:
@shawn4 wrote:

Lold about the php files.

$con = mysql_connect("localhost","root","");
4-5 connections in one file.

And a new connection in online.php

mysql_connect("localhost","root",""); mysql_select_db("pkscapeonline");

You already using “common.php” why do you create 10 new sql connections?

Read full topic

item.title: PkScape F2P Source
item.dc:creator: @Vicd Vicd
item.description:
@Vicd wrote:

Thanks for the release.

I’m trying to get the webclient to work, but ran into some problems.
It runs without any problems when I launch it with “run_client.bat”.
But it does not load on browser…
It gets stuck right away, I can see the red loading box, nothing else…

AHHH it works now, I signed the .jar

Read full topic

Yeah, I worked on it for a bit. Decided I might do a different project. I chose this project since people said they wanted a pking server, so I decided to make a quick pking server. I’ll probably work on a private project for a while and come out with something better. I could still host this, but I chose not to.

These PHP files were implemented into fluxbb forums… so use those else you can convert them which takes 2 seconds.

programming, irc, cars

Fixed a few crashes, it’s pretty stable now. Once I fixed all the crashes that happened while I ran it, it didn’t at all again.
EasyRsc pking is fixed
Removed the GUI runs off CMD
blah blah
so on

It’s F2P once again. That doesn’t mean I removed every “P2P” Item or doesn’t mean I removed P2P landscape, and so on. It just means there is no way to get Bloods, Dragon and such. So you have F2P gear.
I don’t care if you don’t like the release, keep your comment to yourself.
